title: Teenager shot in Richmond's Gilpin Court
content:
A 16-year-old boy is recovering after being shot in Gilpin Court, Richmond police said.
Officers were called about 7:15 p.m. Sunday to the 1100 block of St. Paul Street, police said. There the officers found the victim with a gunshot wound to his back.
The teen told police he was shot after someone in a black Nissan Altima fired at him several times.
The teen was taken to a local hospital with wounds that are not considered life-threatening.
